summary: Email correspondence between defense attorney Bruce Barket and the US Attorney's Office regarding discovery requests in the case of Nicholas Tartaglione, who was housed with Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC). The emails discuss requests for video surveillance, photographs, and investigative reports related to the July 22-23, 2019 incident involving Epstein and Tartaglione in the SHU cell.

events.title: Epstein-Tartaglione SHU Incident
events.description: Incident involving Jeffrey Epstein and Nicholas Tartaglione in their shared SHU cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

locations: 666 Old Country Road, Garden City, NY 11530

keyFacts: The Bureau of Prisons (BOP) confirmed no audio/video recordings were made of BOP interviews with Nicholas Tartaglione.
BOP confirmed no documentation exists regarding the decision to house Tartaglione and Epstein together in the same SHU cell.
BOP confirmed no After Action Report was prepared for the July 22-23 incident involving Epstein and Tartaglione.
The US Attorney's Office compiled a 53-page BOP investigative report on the July 22-23 incident, designated 'Attorney's Eyes Only'.
Defense attorneys sought video surveillance of the area outside the cells for the night of July 22-23 and photographs of the cell and inmates after the incident.
